1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Derivied types.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Type
6 ( Eith,
7   uneith,
8   Map, ManyMap,
9   Test, Test2,
10   int, integer,
11 ) where
12
13-- | Homotype 'Either'.
14type Eith a = Either a a
15
16-- | Extract 'Eith' content.
17--
18--   >>> uneith <$> [Left "L", Right "R"]
19--   ["L", "R"]
20--
21uneith :: Eith a -> a
22uneith (Left x)   = x
23uneith (Right x)  = x
24
25-- | Map from something to same type.
26type Map a = a -> a
27
28-- | Map from something to list of something.
29type ManyMap a = a -> [a]
30
31-- | Boolean-valued function, also called predicate.
32type Test a = a -> Bool
33
34-- | Boolean-valued function with 2 arguments.
35type Test2 a b = a -> b -> Bool
36
37-- | 'Int' shorthand.
38--
39--   >>> int 12
40--   12
41--
42--   This is same as:
43--
44--   >>> 12 :: Int
45--   12
46--
47int :: Map Int
48{-# INLINE int #-}
49int = id
50
51-- | 'Integer' shorthand.
52--
53--   >>> integer 12
54--   12
55--
56--   This is same as:
57--
58--   >>> 12 :: Integer
59--   12
60--
61integer :: Map Integer
62{-# INLINE integer #-}
63integer = id
